attributes.action: Include a “no candidate” option on election papers
attributes.additional_details: Parliament needs to understand when voters have no confidence in the options available too them
attributes.background: Include a “no candidate” option on election papers to allow voters to indicate a lack of confidence in all the candidates. Currently not voting is seen as apathy, and spoiling the ballot paper as ignorance

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Implement "None of the above" on ballots in all United Kingdom elections #NOTAUK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650023
